summary: Small house in Solitude, under the arch. A remake of Trickshots cool mod
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6][/size][/b][/color][/center][center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________

[color=orange][b][size=4]
:: MOONWATCH MANOR RELOADED (1.2) :: [/size][/b][/color]

I had taken the mod down until I had time to clean the deleted navmesh record. I had time now. The mod is squeaky clean and should work perfect. Also fixed funky rugs.

Original mod by Trickshot77
Revamp by Elianora
Scripts and general improvements: Nahkin

[youtube]5j67qamu5lA[/youtube]

Mod adds a small apartment under the Solitude City Arch (next to hall of the dead)
Just walk on in.

This was made by a request I found on Reddit. (NO, I DO NOT TAKE REQUESTS)

[color=#b2222][b][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS:: [/size][/b][/color]
- Skyrim.esm
- Update.esm

For NPCs (like spouses) to sandbox around the house properly, use this mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376[/url]  

[color=orange][b][size=4]:: FEATURES :: [/size][/b][/color]
• Features all vanilla crafting, smithy is in the basement.
• Lots of bookshelves, mannequins and weapon racks
• Mirror for a special feature
• Secret room for display and treasure
• One follower bed
• Navmeshed
• Cleaned with TES5Edit

[color=orange][b][size=4]:: CREDITS :: [/size][/b][/color]
- InsanitySorrow for telescope, charts, painting frames and other beautiful clutter and textures
- Blary for alchemy, study and food clutter
- stroti and Tamira for kitchen clutter and craftsman tools
- Oaristys for modder's resources
- Runspekt for resources for modder's
- tueffelachtein for their upper furniture and modular crafting kit
- TESA folk for the resource kit
- The_Funkstasm for Morrowind clutter and textures
- Lilith for catering and clutter resources
- BrettM for FPI project resource

----------------------------------------------------------
[color=#a52a2a][size=5][b]:: FAQ ::[/b][/size][/color]
Q: Mods in screenies? Recommended mods?
A: Every HQ texture I could find. SMIM. Detailed Rugs. Seasons of Skyrim ENB with Somber Lut Sepia palette. ELE. Relighting Skyrim. Furniture and Clutter - HD Retextures. Langley's Solitude textures or Sexy Solitude.

Q: YOU KILLED MY POTATO WITH YOUR STUFF
A: Sorry. There's a lot of stuff packed in a small space here..

Q: Acquiring this house is super boring and lame and no challenge.
A: Unless you're willing to script me a quest for this mod you have no right to complain.

Q: I WANT MY FAMILY, MY 5 SERVANTS AND THE WHOLE OF SOVNGARDE TO JOIN ME IN THIS HOUSE PLS MAKE MOAR BEDS.
A: Not even. Don't even. Nope. That's final <3

Q: I CAN'T LOOT ANYTHING!?1!!+1+1
A: Why yes, I lock my clutter in place. Can't have you ruining my Feng Shui when you come barging in at 2 AM after drinking all night with Sam Guevenne. We all know you love that wine from San's booth at the Market...

Q: AUTOSORT!!!111 AUTO SORT DEPRH OEDGkdsöglk<sdöglKDGöSAJGÖL!!!
A: NO HERGBHGDGÖDSLGKÖ DSLGJSDLGJÖ! NO. Just no. Not ever. Don't even.

Q: Stupid location. QQ.
A:
